availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew Harrison Ward (Harrison Co, Kentucky, representative and attorney)

body.p: Cynthiana, Kentucky, Representative and attorney. Cynthiana, Kentucky, native. Son of Andrew Ward and Elizabeth Headington Ward. Married to Ellen V. Moore Ward in Harrison County, Kentucky, in September 1846. Father of Mollie M. Ward. Married to Elizabeth Ware Ward in Harrison County on December 31, 1857. Attended Transylvania University in Lexington, Kentucky. Attorney in Cynthiana, Kentucky, in 1844. City attorney of Cynthiana in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Harrison County from 1863 to 1865. Representative for Kentucky's Sixth District in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1866 to 1867.

ab.bibl: Biographical Cyclopedia of the Commonwealth of Kentucky (Chicago: John Gresham Company, 1896) p. 29-30.
